mapper.insert: SELECT TTY_PO_TASK_HISTORY_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO tty_po_task_history(ID,TASK_ID,TASK_EVENT_TYPE,TASK_EVENT_TITLE,CONTENT,REPORT_CONTENT,REPORT_PROC,DELAY_REASON,DELAY_ENDDATE,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_DEPT,CREATE_USER_ORG,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_USER,MODIFY_DATE,EXT_DATE1,EXT_DATE2,EXT_NUM1,EXT_NUM2,EXT_NUM3,EXT_STR1,EXT_STR2,EXT_STR3,EXT_STR4,EXT_STR5) VALUES (#{id},#{taskId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{taskEventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{taskEventTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reportContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reportProc,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{delayReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delayEnddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserOrg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extNum1,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum3,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extStr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_po_task_history
TASK_ID = #{taskId},
TASK_EVENT_TYPE = #{taskEventType},
TASK_EVENT_TITLE = #{taskEventTitle},
CONTENT = #{content},
REPORT_CONTENT = #{reportContent},
REPORT_PROC = #{reportProc},
DELAY_REASON = #{delayReason},
DELAY_ENDDATE = #{delayEnddate},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
